title: Empire of Fulfillment
alt_text: Illustration of a castle inside a cardboard box
image_description: A surreal monochrome silkscreen depicting a castle in a taped cardboard box; it weighs permanence against disposability.

title: Take Me With You
alt_text: A small house set inside an open cardboard box
image_description: A hand‑inked drawing of a modest house cradled within a moving box, suggesting portability, precarity, and shelter.

title: Dear Dr. Strangelove
alt_text: Sunflower growing out of the pages of a worn book
image_description: A sunflower emerges from the spine of a distressed book; organic growth vs haunted literature.
